episodes.title: The World's Most Terrifying Cults: Poison, Sacrifice, and Mass Death
episodes.description:
Three cult leaders. Thousands dead.
From Jonestown to Tokyo to Matamoros — this is how faith turned into mass murder.
Watch the terrifying true story of Jim Jones, Shoko Asahara, and Adolfo Constanzo — the cult masterminds Too Brutal for Netflix. #TrueCrimeDocumentary #truecrimecommunity #crime #horror #Cults #CultLeader 
Dive into this disturbing true crime documentary analyzing the 3 deadliest cult leaders of the modern era. We examine the horrifying final acts of Jim Jones (The Jonestown massacre), Shoko Asahara (The Tokyo subway sarin attack by Aum Shinrikyo), and Adolfo Constanzo (The Narcosatanic cult murders and human sacrifices in Matamoros). This video breaks down the cult leader psychology and the dark tactics of brainwashing that led to these mass deaths.

#JimJones #AumShinrikyo #TrueCrimeDocumentary #Cults #Jonestown #ShokoAsahara #CultLeader
